co.paralleluniverse.actors

Class LocalActor<Message,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.actors.ActorImpl<Message>
      • co.paralleluniverse.actors.LocalActor<Message,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor<Message>, ActorBuilder<Message,V>, Joinable<V>, Port<Message>, ReceivePort<Message>, SendPort<Message>, Stranded, SuspendableCallable<V>, Serializable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicActor, BasicGenBehavior

extends ActorImpl<Message>
implements SuspendableCallable<V>, Joinable<V>, Stranded, ReceivePort<Message>, ActorBuilder<Message,V>

      • reinstantiate

        protected LocalActor<Message,V> reinstantiate()
        ' Returns a "clone" of this actor, used by a supervisor to restart this actor if it dies.

        If this actor is supervised by a supervisor and was not created with the newActor factory method, then this method should be overridden.

        Returns:
        A new LocalActor instance that's a clone of this.
